query:
SELECT 
            id as user_id,
            display_name,
            avatar_url,
            ROUND(total_score::numeric / games_played, 0)::bigint as "score!: i64",
            games_played as games_count
        FROM users
        WHERE games_played >= 3
        ORDER BY (total_score::numeric / games_played) DESC, games_played DESC
        LIMIT $1 OFFSET $2
